description: I know that in 20 years XTerm won't have change a bit. It will never annoy me, it's the ultimate terminal emulator.
I am use it since it was created many years ago, but never found better.

If you know what you are doing, there is nothing more reliable than xterm. No crashes, lowest latency off all terminals, even lower than suckless st, and stable in every possible way. Just read the manual, customize your .Xresources file, and live with the peace of knowing you will never have to think about terminal problems again.
Удалось запустить MATLAB через панель инструментов Double Commander.
